{"id":389152971,"question_id":43,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"4 years, 5 months","timestamp":1598917055,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"8 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/389152971/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Multiply Strings","memory":"6.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string multiply(string num1, string num2) {\n\t\tint m=num1.length();\n        int n=num2.length();\n        \n        if(num1.length()==1 && num1[0]=='0') return \"0\";\n        if(num2.length()==1 && num2[0]=='0') return \"0\";\n        vector<int> multi(m+n, 0);\n        \n\t\tfor(int i=m-1; i>=0; i--) {\n\t\t\tfor(int j=n-1; j>=0; j--) {\n\t\t\t\tint multiOne = (num1[i]-'0') * (num2[j]-'0');\n\t\t\t\tint p1 = i+j;\n\t\t\t\tint p2 = i+j+1;\n\t\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\tint sumOne = multiOne + multi[p2];\n\t\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\tmulti[p1] +=sumOne/10;\n\t\t\t\tmulti[p2] = sumOne % 10;\n\t\t\t}\n\t\t}\n\t\t\n\t\tstring res;\n\t\tfor(int i=0; i<multi.size(); i++) {\n\t\t\tif(multi[i]==0 && res.length()==0) {\n\t\t\t} else {\n\t\t\tres.push_back('0'+multi[i]);\n\t\t\t};\n\t\t\t\t\n\t\t};\n\t\t\n\t\treturn res;\n\t\t\t\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"multiply-strings","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
